description.value:
The Sage of Sages is a patron of all who seek truth. While less active than the other Empyreans, Ilora blesses those who value knowledge in any form.

Edicts: Record events, share knowledge with others, question beliefs.

Anathema: Sow or perpetuate lies, destroy books or monuments, keep silent when faced with false information.

Areas of Concern: Lore, scholars, academics, history, truth.
